TopicTitle: More WW2 weapons for BDArmory Continued?

Articles.Content: I've mounted a 105mm howitzer on a fighter jet, but that's just silly. Is there an addon that has sizes of cannons which were actually flown on planes during WW2 and early jets? A 20mm and a 75mm would do for a start. The later F-86 Sabre had four 20mm cannons. The P-61 and the later F-4U Corsair were also equipped with four 20mm.

Aviator Arsenal has loads of weapons from different countries. M2s, ShVak, Hispano... even has a BK75mm gun. Parts are very high quality too.

 

Edited September 8, 2017 by Markush100
